p.b: We are happy to announce that the following nine students have been accepted to work on projects under the Gentoo umbrella for this years Summer of Code:

ul.li: Apparatus - An (interactive) ebuild development tool based on paludis by Tiziano Muller, mentored by Danny van Dyk and Mike Kelly.
Collective Maintenance by Andrey Falko, mentored by Stephen Bennett and Christel Dahlskjaer.
BaseGUI by Luis Francisco Araujo, mentored by Alec Warner and Markus Ullmann.
GNAP Cross Compile Support by Philipp Riegger, mentored by Jose Alberto Suarez Lopez and Alexander Faeroy.
archfs: Filesystem in userspace for rdiff-backup repositories by Filip Gruzcynski, mentored by Arockiasamy Mohanraj and Christel Dahlskjaer.
Robust Cisco-like configuration interface for GNAP-powered embedded distros by Alexandros Stergiakis, mentored by Alexandre Faeroy and Jose Alberto Suarez Lopez.
equizApp - system that helps Gentoo Recruiters and mentors create and manage quizzes for new recruits by Grzegorz Kulewski, mentored by Christel Dahlskjaer and Bryan Ã˜stergaard.
SCIRE's job subsystem implementation by Rodrigo Eduardo Lazo Paz, mentored by Matt Disney and Preston Cody.
Python Bindings for Paludis by Piotr Jaroszynski, mentored by Saleem Abdulrasool and Stephen Bennett.

body.p: More information about the individual projects can be found here. We welcome the new contributors onboard and look forward to working with them over the summer!
